channel.title: Migrate your application to Liteflow
channel.description:
With the launch of Liteflow, the current ecosystem of MESG has changed, and your application is slightly different, but that’s for the best.

This is a companion discussion topic for the original entry at https://blog.mesg.com/migrate-your-application-to-liteflow/
